snippet: HAIMOWITZ--Patricia Hurley. Pat died peacefully at home June 20. Loving wife, mother, and stepmother. A bright star in the public relations firmament for more than a half century, notably at St. Vincent's Hospital Manhattan, 1960-1972, then as partner in Hurley & Haimowitz Public Relations. Funeral mass Thursday 10am, St. Augustine Church, 116 Sixth Ave., Brooklyn. 1/3
